entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a young wizard who has defeated the Dark Lord. (Excerpt: 'Harry Potter survived...')

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as Voldemort. (Excerpt: 'He Who Must Not Be Named')

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is loyal to Harry Potter and tries to protect him from harm. (Excerpt: 'Dobby... cannot let Harry Potter stay here now that history is to repeat itself')

entities.name: harry's water jug
entities.description: An object in the story that Dobby uses to crack over his own head. (Excerpt: 'Dobby froze... then grabbed Harry’s water jug from his bedside table and cracked it over his own head')

entities.name: chamber of secrets
entities.description: A mysterious location at Hogwarts that has been opened before. (Excerpt: 'now that the Chamber of Secrets is open once more –’)

relationships.entity_2: he who must not be named
relationships.description: Harry Potter has defeated He Who Must Not Be Named. (Excerpt: 'Harry Potter survived, and the Dark Lord’s power was broken')
The Chamber of Secrets is related to Harry Potter as it has been opened before. (Excerpt: 'So there is a Chamber of Secrets? And – did you say it’s been opened before?')
Dobby tries to protect Harry Potter from harm. (Excerpt: 'Dobby cannot let Harry Potter stay here now that history is to repeat itself')

The Chamber of Secrets is related to Dobby as he tries to prevent Harry from staying at Hogwarts where the Chamber has been opened. (Excerpt: 'now that history is to repeat itself, now that the Chamber of Secrets is open once more –’)
